title: Document Submission
content:
The website says 5 July is last date for original documents' submission. Do we have to go to Bangalore before 5 July to submit the documents? Coz dutring counselling they just asked for photocopies of original documents. 

Also, do they just verify the documents or keep them? Coz I don't think UGC allows colleges to keep the original documents like marksheets and all.

comments.body:
You need to submit all the original documents. Although I am not sure of the date because if I remember correctly they give you time until the end of the first semester to submit them. And yes, you need to submit them in person at the admission office in MRD, RR campus.

College keeps all the original documents until the end of the first year, after which you can go and collect them.
hey did you get any further information regarding this? i mean do we have to submit the documents right now or we can do so once classes start
